avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow added in calm wind. Older snow considered stable. Changing weather with alternating snow showers and thaw and rain showers the next days. Minor movements cannot be ruled out.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow added in calm wind, but poor bonding is with in the snow. Older snow considered stable. Changing weather with alternating snow showers and thaw and rain showers the next days. Minor movements cannot be ruled out.

travelAdvisory.comment: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.

weatherForecast.highlights: Umhleypingarsamt veður næstu daga, frost og él eða hlýindi og skúrir til skiptis.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Thinn wind slabs may be expected in southerly aspects. Southerly wind and snow showers the next days and unstable winds slabs may form in mountains.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow after N-NE snow showers on Sunday and Monday. Unstable thinn wind slabs may be expected in southerly aspects. Older snow is homogeneous and grainy. Southerly wind and snow showers expected the next days and unstable winds slabs may form in mountains.

travelAdvisory.comment: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.

weatherForecast.highlights: Suðvestan 5-10 og él, en bætir í vind og ofankomu fimmtudags kvöld. Gengur á með éljum til fjalla á föstudag en slydda eða rigning á láglendi.

avalancheActivity.highlights: It has snowed on top of the old hard packed snow and wind slabs are present. Wet sluffs could release on Friday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Small wind slabs could be present on most aspects. A snowpit from Siglufjörður on Feb 26th showed a slab on top of the old snow. A compression test showed a sudden collapse at medium load on the boundary between the old and new snow. Rising temperature on Friday and small wet sluffs could release.

travelAdvisory.comment: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.

weatherForecast.highlights: Suðlægar áttir og él á fimmtudag. Á föstudag gengur lægð yfir landið með hvassri S-lægri átt, hlýindum og rigningu en mögulega snjókomu til fjalla. Kólnar aftur á laugardag með éljum.

avalancheActivity.comment: Small sluff released in Magnúsartindur in Oddsskarð on Feb 26th. Multiple thin avalanches released in Seldalur and Fannardalur in Norðfjörður on Saturday morning, 22.2.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow is at high elevations and may be unstable at first, and in the first sunshine. Wet sluffs could release on Friday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It has snowed a bit in the last few days. There is little snow left in the lower parts of slopes but at high elevations the new snow can be unstable at first. Rising temperature and rain on Friday which may cause wet sluffs. The old snow is considered homogenous and stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Wet sluffs could release as temperatures rise.

weatherForecast.highlights: Vestlægar eða breytilegar áttir á fimmtudag og skýjað með köflum. Hiti um og yfir frostmarki við sjávarmál en frost til fjalla. Á föstudag kemur lægð að landinu með S-átt, hlýnandi veðri og rigningu nema í efstu tindum. Aftur SV-læg átt á laugardag og kólnar.
